name: JengaDESU
description:
Pitch

In JungaDesu you play as a real estate developer and you have to build the highest possible tower. But voila, you have no more resources and you will have to build with what we offer you.

You like KATAMARI ? You like Tricky Tower, You will love Jenga Desu !!

We are two French developers based in Lyon (France) And we wanted to share with you our love for game development Enjoy!
